name: Laurel County Health Department
description: Public health department serving Laurel County since 1931, dedicated to preventing, promoting, and protecting public health through quality health education, preventive health care, and environmental services. Offers WIC nutrition services, diabetes education, harm reduction programs, environmental health services, and communicable disease reporting.
source: Verified from official Laurel County Health Department website and multiple authoritative sources
eligibility: Open to all Laurel County residents
services: WIC nutrition services, diabetes education, harm reduction programs, environmental health services, communicable disease reporting, public health education, preventive health care
notes: Executive Director: Clay B Carroll. Environmental Office: (606) 878-0499. Plumbing Inspector: (606) 622-7666. For public health emergencies after hours, contact local law enforcement or dial 9-1-1.
